Source.Name: Manure (confined)
Source.Description: Sum of total Phosphorus from Manure in Confined Operations (kg)

Source.Name: Manure (unconfined)
Source.Description: Sum of total Phosphorus from Manure in Unconfined Operations (kg)

Source.Name: Fertilizers (farm)
Source.Description: Sum total of Phosphorus from Farms (kg)

CommonTerms.Term:
Each model has different sources that were determined by statistically significant by the modeler. Choose a source from the list to present data only from that source. This model contains these sources:
All Not really a separate source, it just tallies all the sources together. Reported in kg. Point Sources (Total) PCS Phosphorus 2002, kg (total) Manure (confined) Sum total of Phosphorus from Manure in Confined Operations (kg) Manure (unconfined) Sum total of Phosphorus from Manure in Unconfined Operations (kg) Fertilizers (farm) Sum total of Phosphorus from Farms (kg) Forest, Wetland, Scrub Forest, Wetland, Scrub (kg/m2) Urban, Open Urban, Open (kg/m2)
